com.test.automation.common.framework

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.test.automation.common.framework.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends Object
    Yaml enabled, configurable Settings object based on Apache Commons-Configuration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Settings()
      Creates a Settings object that uses the default yaml file.
      Settings(String yamlPath)
      Creates a Settings object that uses the provided yaml file.
      Settings(String settingsProperty, String defaultYamlPath)
      Create a Settings object that will point to the yaml file referenced by the SystemProperty specified, or if that is null/empty, points at the provided default yaml path.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean asBoolean(String name)
      Return a boolean value from the settings.
      int asInt(String name)
      Return a integer value from the settings.
      List<String> list(String name)
      Return a List from the settings.
      Map<String,String> map(String name)
      Return a Map from the settings.
      String toString() 
      String value(String name)
      Return a string value from the settings.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Settings

        public Settings()
         throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Creates a Settings object that uses the default yaml file.

        Value of sehelper.settings or if unset/empty, defaults.yml

        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if failed to load yaml configuration file

      • Settings

        public Settings(String yamlPath)
         throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Creates a Settings object that uses the provided yaml file.
        Parameters:
        yamlPath - Relative or Absolute path to a yaml file to use
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if failed to load yaml configuration file

      • Settings

        public Settings(String settingsProperty,
                String defaultYamlPath)
         throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Create a Settings object that will point to the yaml file referenced by the SystemProperty specified, or if that is null/empty, points at the provided default yaml path.
        Parameters:
        settingsProperty - System property to read yaml path from
        defaultYamlPath - yaml path to use if system property not set/empty
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - if failed to load yaml configuration file

    • Method Detail

      • value

        public String value(String name)
        Return a string value from the settings.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the String value to load
        Returns:
        Value of the string, or null if it doesn't exist

      • asInt

        public int asInt(String name)
        Return a integer value from the settings.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the Integer value to load
        Returns:
        Value of the Integer, or throws an exception if can't convert to an int

      • asBoolean

        public boolean asBoolean(String name)
        Return a boolean value from the settings.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the Boolean value to load
        Returns:
        Value of the Boolean, or throws an exception if can't convert to a boolean

      • list

        public List<String> list(String name)
        Return a List from the settings.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the list to load
        Returns:
        The referenced list, or null if it doesn't exist
